ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide

Class TrialDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide.TrialDefinition

  • public class TrialDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    An object for specifying the setup of a given randomised control trial, including the Attributes, the treatment arms, the allocation method, and any additional parameters.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Liam de Valmency (lpdv1g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Aleksandar Botev (ab9g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Dionisio Perez-Mavrogenis (dpm3g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Kim Svensson (ks6g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    Participant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrialDefinition()
      Constructs an empty TrialDefinition object, with an empty list of attributes, treatments, parameters and clustering factors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrialDefinition

        public TrialDefinition()
        Constructs an empty TrialDefinition object, with an empty list of attributes, treatments, parameters and clustering factors.

      • TrialDefinition

        public TrialDefinition(java.lang.String trialName,
               java.lang.Class<? extends Strategy> strategy,
               java.lang.String strategyID,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> strategyParams,
               java.util.List<Attribute> attributes,
               java.util.List<Treatment> treatments,
               int[] clusterFactors)
        Creates a TrialDefinition with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        trialName - The trial's name. Should be lower-case and alphanumeric.
        strategy - The Strategy class which should be used for allocating participants for this trial.
        strategyID - The name of the allocation strategy (will usually be identical to the class name for the strategy parameter).
        strategyParams - A map of additional allocation parameters, indexed on the parameter name, mapping to a float value for the parameter.
        attributes - A list of Attributes, which define the data on which the allocation is based.
        treatments - A list of Treatments, which define the treatment arms into which participants may be allocated.
        clusterFactors - A list of integers which acts as an index into the attributes list. Attributes indexed by the values in this array act as factors on which to cluster during the trial.

        public void setDefaultTreatment(Treatment treatment)

      • setDefaultTreatment

        public void setDefaultTreatment(java.lang.String treatmentName)
        Sets the default treatment to use in the event that each of the treatment arms reaches their participant limit. May have no effect if no treatment with the given name exists in this trial.
        Parameters:
        treatmentName - The name of the treatment to use as the default treatment (must exist as a treatment in the list of treatments for this trial).

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getStratifiedEnumeration

        public int getStratifiedEnumeration(Participant participant)
        Parameters:
        participant - The participant to find the stratified group index for.
        Returns:
        The index of the group which the patient falls into when the groups are enumerated over the stratification attributes. Enumeration of these groups is done in the order of Attributes, then their group values.

      • getStratifiedCount

        public int getStratifiedCount()
        Returns:
        The number of separate groups which result when stratifying over the specified grouping factors (e.g. stratifying over two attributes, each with three groups, results in nine stratified groups).

      • getStratificationString

        public java.lang.String getStratificationString(int group)
        Parameters:
        group - The ID of the stratified group to which a participant belongs (one fetched by getStratifiedEnumeration(Participant)).
        Returns:
        A string which contains a human-readable, comma separated list of the group values corresponding to a specific stratified group ID.
